attributes.action: Make helmets a legal requirement whilst riding a bike or scooter.
attributes.additional_details: Everyday I see so many children cycling to school with groups of friends or by themselves not wearing helmets. I have witnessed too many near misses with children on bikes almost colliding with cars. What happens if a child falls off their bike and cracks open their head? Wouldn’t it be better for a helmet to be cracked instead of their head? Why are so many adults not setting an example and wearing a helmet too? Please change the law!
attributes.background: Please make it a legal requirement for any adult and child to wear a helmet if they are riding a bicycle or scooter.
